title: Pool Party Rewards
body:
With the pool party rewards it says "Negative players who won’t unlock Pool Party Mundo or the Pool Party icon we took a look at an accounts recent history (February to now) with LeaverBuster, bans, and chat and ranked restrictions to make the call. We expect the vast majority of players to be eligible for the rewards" I left a game pvp game once, because I really needed to go, does this mean I won't get rewards?
TL;DR I left one game, do I still get rewards? Sorry didn't know where to upload this
Thanks,
Minimachine {{champion:40}}

replies.body: It depends on how often you leave and get banned sometimes you have to leave due to family stuff and riot knows this so you should be fine
